title: New lower rents! Move into your new home TODAY!
posting_body: Want more info on this unit?
WELCOME TO ECHO RIDGE AT NORTH HILLS
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 930 Sq.
Welcome home to Echo Ridge at North Hills in Northglenn, Colorado.
We are conveniently located near Denver’s light rail system, minutes away from I-25, and close to a variety of restaurants, shopping, and entertainment.
Our great location is guaranteed to make your life comfortable and convenient.
Our community offers spacious one and two bedroom floor plans with amenities fit for your everyday life.
Each of our homes include a washer and dryer and well-appointed kitchens.
Living space is increased with a balcony or patio.
Select homes offer fireplaces, beautiful mountain views, and walk-in closets.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
